thread.title: New DOSM for The Discovery Leisure Company
thread.title_full: New DOSM for The Discovery Leisure Company

author: Boracay Island, August 3, 2015
title: New DOSM for The Discovery Leisure Company
text:
New DOSM for The Discovery Leisure Company Boracay Island, August 3, 2015 
THE Discovery Leisure Company has named Charley Magabo director of sales and marketing for its two luxury resorts, Discovery Shores Boracay and Club Paradise Palawan. 

Magabo joins the Filipino hospitality group after a decade of marketing luxury resorts and cultivating global and wholesale MICE markets for Shangri-La Hotels and Resorts and Shangri-Laâ€™s Mactan Resort & Spa in Cebu.
